GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article specified

article.title: Sony Vaio; or, The Laptop

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments specific to article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of the comment that has been added to the specific article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the updated article with votes either incremented or decremented

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves an empty object when comment deleted successfully

GET /api/users.description: serves an array with all users

GET /api/articles?sort_by=created_at&ord.description: serves an array with all articles sorted by queries in the order specified
